channel.title: LOOK! Whoever bothers to help me gets a co-owner status on my server!
channel.description: ok i got my server built and everything! i've tried No-ip and i put the "server name".no-ip.info then theres an ip underneath already there.. i added and it dont work when i type in "server name".no-ip.info . im wondering , does it have anything to do with my wireless router (ADSL) if so what can i do.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 12:22:45 PM[/size][hr]

item.title: LOOK! Whoever bothers to help me gets a co-owner status on my server!
item.dc:creator: @bloop bloop
item.description:
@bloop wrote:

ok and when you see xtra ip down … that is your internett ip do not remove that just put “servername”.no-ip.info and let all other stand like it does

Read full topic
